structure.comment:
When an action (that has a code) is run in the process, this is called. We mandate the use of an action code for two reasons:
- limit the amount of times we call this listener - force you to use a "proper" dependency rather than having a dependency to something like id or name
Additionally when a process changes state because of an action and the "to" state has a code, we run it as well.
